steps.function: async (ctx) => { await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 3000)); const bodyText = document.body.innerText; const hasLogin = /login|sign in/i.test(bodyText); const hasProfileBuild = /build.*profile|profile.*build/i.test(bodyText); return { hasLogin, hasProfileBuild, pageTitle: document.title, bodyTextPreview: bodyText.substring(0, 500) }; }

async (ctx) => { const pageText = document.body.innerText.toLowerCase(); const hasNextStep = /next step|learning path|your path/i.test(pageText); const hasBuilding = /building|generating|please check back/i.test(pageText); const hasProfileForm = /conversation|ai tutor|ready to build/i.test(pageText); return { hasNextStep, hasBuilding, hasProfileForm, pageTextLength: pageText.length }; }
